name: Lost Marbles (itch) (Starboi hooch)
description:
Gramps and Husband have lost their marbles and see the world through a less than lucid view. Collect marbles to store them in your pockets and when you have enough, give them to your husband to save them to your score. Watch out for enemies though because if they hit you, you'll drop all the marbles in your pocket and lose a life.

Controls:

ActionControlAlt ControlMoveA and DLeft and Right arrow keysJumpWUp arrow keyShootLeft ClickSpacePauseEsc

This is my first game and it was made as part of a week long game jam. Hope you enjoy and thanks for playing!
